name: superset
description: Apache Superset Helm chart for Kubernetes deployment
notes: This installs Helm CLI and packages the Apache Superset Helm chart v0.15.1 from GitHub source. Version 0.15.1 was released on GitHub but never published to the official Helm repository (https://apache.github.io/superset), so the script clones the repository and packages the chart locally. The packaged chart is saved to /tmp/superset-0.15.1.tgz. Requires Kubernetes cluster for actual deployment. The original validate_cmd 'superset --version' is not applicable as this is a Helm chart, not a standalone CLI tool.
